title: High flow water
review: If you want to see high flow of water and want to take bath then go to this place and enjoy the beauty.

title: Luni River
review: Luni River is nice River with high flow water.This River has beautiful photography view.my experience to see this is ok

title: Almost dried up stream
review: Once it was the main river of Rajasthan. In fact, all great civilizations appeared in river valleys. For Rajasthan  Luni became such river. But now it is in many desert areas drying river and its flow is gaining ground only in the rainy season and mostly in the area of Jodhpur and beyond. It is believed that its source is near Ajmer in Pushkar valley, somewhere between Dantra and Bhanwta. However,  in Pushkar they showed me some brook near  "Pushkar Lake Palace Hotel" with  almost dried up stream and said that this is Luni river, only here it's called Sukri.

title: Its a Dead water stream
review: I visited the place in May 2018 So I am not sure if its the summer which is causing the dry up or its by default like that. Right now I see cattle grazing the place. Not much to be desired but you can visit it in the rains for some good signs.

title: Hardly any water
review: Once upon a time it was pretty and flowing river but it's almost dried up now. though it was nice to sit along he river and witness the beautiful sunset .

title: River
review: Luni river is beautiful river.luni river is peaceful river. great experience to see this.good one place.
